Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Broadway/Devon
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via  Broadway, Sheridan, Thorndale and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Devon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via  Broadway, Sheridan, Thorndale and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Devon.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
